biotools.summary:
An Online Tool to Visualize Magnetostriction.

MAELASviewer: Online visualization of magnetostriction.

MAELASviewer is an online tool to visualize magnetostriction. This interactive applet shows the magnetostriction for some crystal systems. You can simulate the Joule and Wiedemann effects.

A magnetostrictive material is one which changes in size due to a change of state of magnetization.
